name: Robusto
additionalNotes:
Four different vitolas refered to as robustos.
Canimao cigars are offered in two wrapper shades; Habano Sun Grown and Ecuadorian Connecticut Shade. The Connecticut shade cigars are very reminiscent of Cabaiguan by Tatuaje. They are full flavored, but smooth and easy to smoke, with a medium body. The Habano wrapped cigars are full bodied and full flavored. Fillers are NIC/DR.
